text: The Swarm is a 1978 American science fiction horror movie directed by Irwin Allen and stars Michael Caine, Katharine Ross, Richard Widmark, Richard Chamberlain, Olivia de Havilland, Ben Johnson, Lee Grant, Jos√© Ferrer, Patty Duke, Slim Pickens, Bradford Dillman, Fred MacMurray, Henry Fonda. title: The Swarm (movie)
